King Hussein Medical Center, Jordan[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading text=”Biography” font_container=”tag:h5|text_align:left|color:%231e73be” google_fonts=”font_family:Raleway%3A100%2C200%2C300%2Cregular%2C500%2C600%2C700%2C800%2C900|font_style:900%20bold%20regular%3A900%3Anormal” css=”.vc_custom_1667689874988{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text el_class=”SpTitlesFull”]Chief of general surgery King Hussien medical center

  • Chief of hepato-biliary and pancreatic and liver transplantation unit at King Hussein Medical Center/Royal Medical Services/Amman-Jordan.
  • Chief of Jordanian board of general surgery
  • Jordanian board examiner for HBP and liver transplant
  • Europian board examiner for HBP surgery
  • Kurdish board examiner for general surgery

Professional memberships:

  • Member of the Jordanian Medical Association, 1989.
  • Member of the Jordanian Association of General Surgeons, 1996.
  • Member of Pan Arab Liver Transplantation Society (PALTS), 2006.
  • Fellowship of liver transplantation Istanbul- Turkey 2008
  • Member of International association of surgeon gastroentrologist and oncologist (IASGO) 2009
  • Member of Mediterranean society of organ transplantation (MESOT) 2010
  • Member of International Hepato-Biliary-Pancreatic Association (IHBPA)
  • Fellow of American College of Surgeon ( FACS) 2011
  • Founder member of Middle East and Eorth Africa Hepato-pancreatico-biliary Association {MENA)
  • Founder Member Of Jordanian chapter of American College of Surgeon
  • Board examiner in surgical oncology board –King Hussien cancer center

Post-doctoral training:

  • Clinical fellowship in Hepato-biliary and pancreatic surgery at Florence Nightingale hospital Istanbul – Turkey (August, 2006-August, 2008).
  • Clinical fellowship in liver, pancreas and kidney transplantation at organ transplantation center/ Florence Nightingale hospital Istanbul – Turkey (August, 2006-August, 2008).
